meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mary Jo Shoop Rachel Liptak Steve Rininger Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6570.

td.p: Mary Jo Shoop, an associate program manager from Arlington, Virginia
Rachel Liptak, a substitute teacher from Temecula, California
Steve Rininger, a lawyer from Chicago, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,200)

tr.td: WE PUT CHARACTERS ON TRIAL
IVY LEAGUE ALMA MATERS
TRACK & FIELD
LOOKING GOOD!
THINK GLOBAL
"ACT" LOCAL

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
